Class CardBase

java.lang.Object
edu.wit.scds.ds.lists.app.card_game.universal_base.card.CardBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<CardBase>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Card
public abstract class CardBase extends Object implements Comparable<CardBase>
representation of any kind of playing card providing 'universal' functionality

NOTE: Do not modify this code

Version:
1.0 2025-06-26 Initial implementation, 2.0 2025-07-11
  • rename from Card to UniversalBaseCard
  • add persistence
  • make most instance methods fluent
  • eliminate all constructors except no-arg and 1-arg supplying face up text
  • add null-argument checking
  • move Persistence to its own source file
, 3.0 2025-11-02 rename from UniversalBaseCard to CardBase - less of a mouthful, 3.1 2025-11-11 add {get,set}FaceUpTextLocked(), 3.2 2025-11-19 add template card support
Author:
David M Rosenberg

  • Constructor Details

    • CardBase

      protected CardBase()
      set initial state to default values

    • CardBase

      protected CardBase(Persistence cardPersistence)
      set initial state to default values with specified persistence

      Note: this constructor is typically used by a deck to create permanent cards from templates in its constructor or during game play for cloning a card which should be temporary for matching, lookup, etc.

      Parameters:
      cardPersistence - the persistence specifically for this card
      Since:
      2.0

    • CardBase

      protected CardBase(String initialFaceUpText)
      set initial state to specified face up text and default orientation
      Parameters:
      initialFaceUpText - text to display when the card is face up
      Since:
      2.0

    • CardBase

      protected CardBase(CardBase sourceCard, Persistence cardPersistence)
      create a copy of this card, typically temporary if we're permanent, permanent if we're template

      only CardBase fields are copied; the subclass is responsible for copying everything else

      Parameters:
      sourceCard - the card to clone
      cardPersistence - the persistence for the clone
      Since:
      3.2

    • getPermanentDecoration

      public static String[] getPermanentDecoration()
      retrieve the decoration text for permanent cards
      Returns:
      2-element array where [0] is the left decoration and [1] is the right

      2.0

    • hide

      public CardBase hide()
      Turn a card face down
      Returns:
      this card (fluent)

    • matches

      public boolean matches(CardBase otherCard)
      Compare two cards to see if they match, which may be different from them being equal()

      The game or Pile class may require this method to behave differently from equals() or compareTo() which will be implemented in the game-specific Card class.

      Note: this implementation uses equals() to perform the match functionality which may be overridden in a subclass

      Parameters:
      otherCard - the card to compare against this card
      Returns:
      true if the cards match, false otherwise

    • resetDefaultFaceDownText

      public static String resetDefaultFaceDownText()
      reset the default text to display when the card is face down to the system default
      Returns:
      the previous text to display when the card is face down

    • resetDefaultOrientation

      public static Orientation resetDefaultOrientation()
      reset the default orientation for new cards to the system default

      Note that this will only be effective for cards instantiated

      Returns:
      the previous state (face up/down)

    • resetDefaultPersistence

      public static Persistence resetDefaultPersistence()
      reset the default persistence for new cards to the system default

      Note that this will only be effective for cards subsequently instantiated

      Returns:
      the previous state (permanent/temporary/template)
      Since:
      2.0

    • setDefaultFaceDownText

      public static String setDefaultFaceDownText(String newFaceDownText)
      Set the default text to display when the card is face down
      Parameters:
      newFaceDownText - the new default text to display when the card is face down
      Returns:
      the previous text to display when the card is face down

    • setDefaultOrientation

      public static Orientation setDefaultOrientation(Orientation newOrientation) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Set the default orientation for new cards to be face up/down

      Note that this will only be effective for cards subsequently instantiated

      Parameters:
      newOrientation - the new default orientation (face up/down state)
      Returns:
      the previous state (face up/down)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the specified orientation is other than FACE_UP or FACE_DOWN

    • setDefaultPersistence

      public static Persistence setDefaultPersistence(Persistence newPersistence)
      set persistence for new cards

      Note: decks (the classes which instantiate the cards for game play) are the only classes expected to change the persistence

      Parameters:
      newPersistence - the new persistence setting
      Returns:
      the prior persistence
      Since:
      2.0

    • validatePersistence

      private static void validatePersistence(Persistence aPersistence)
      ensure that a persistence is supplied and applicable to a card (is one of TEMPORARY, PERMANENT), or TEMPLATE
      Parameters:
      aPersistence - the Persistence to validate
      Since:
      2.0

    • setFaceUpTextLocked

      protected boolean setFaceUpTextLocked(boolean locked)
      set the face up text lock setting
      Parameters:
      locked - true to lock it, false to make it changeable
      Returns:
      the prior setting
